message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $1500000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $900000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $1100000. This is a fair price considering its value to me and the benefits it will bring to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice, but $1100000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000. Can you consider that?

I understand that $950000 is still a bit below your target, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $1050000. This is a compromise that I hope we can both agree on. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but $1050000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $980000. Can you consider that?

I understand that $980000 is still a bit below your target, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $1030000. This is a compromise that I hope we can both agree on. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but $1030000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $990000. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $1020000. This is my final offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $980000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
